data.author: volle

changelog.release_notes:
- Add weather providers: Yahoo, DarkSky, OpenWeatherMap & WeatherUnderground
- Add sleep time customization
- Change stepcount & distance display
- Add Heart-rate support
- Add Emery platform

- Reduce draw calls (may improve the battery life)
- Add battery saving mode (see settings)

- switch to SDK 4
- add diorite platform
- add weather localization

- Fix the day of year display
- Fix the logic when the cached weather information is read

- Switch to CommonJS-style
- Switch to Auto assigned MessageKeys
- Switch configuration to clay framework

- Fixed transparent background of images
- Fixed watchface icon
- Added support for chalk (i don't own this device, there be dragons!)

- Added night images
- Changed some images
- Removed leading zeros from min max temperature display
- Added option to disable accelerometer (-> only the current weather will be shown)
- Added support for aplite devices (not yet tested on live device, there be dragons!)

- Improved accelerometer
- Improved internal messaging
- Added option to set color of hour
- Added option to set color of minutes
- Added option to set temperature min / max instead of day of year / week of year

- Fixed memory leak during image drawing
- Possible fix for missing settings & not updating weather

- Add location settings
- Possible fix for not loading settings screen

- Added sleep mode
- New network lookup code

- Fixed BT vibration
- Added option to select date style
- Added option to disable weather update retry
- Improved update logic
- Added option to select weather & network refresh time
- Complete code refactoring
- Added pebble forum link

- Added temperature setting °C /°F
- Added clock setting 24h / 12h

data.description:
Watchface inspired by chops's Trekv3.

Features:
- Time (24H)
- Date (day of week & date)
- Day of year
- Week of year
- Weather information (temperature, conditions, icon, location (tap the pebble))
- Pebble battery status
- Phone battery status
- Network connection status
- Bluetooth connection status
- Health information (step count & distance)
- Customizable colors
- Customizable date style
- Customizable vibration options
- Sleep mode

Credits: see github page
Wishes: use pebble forum (website link)
